name: Project Triangle
description:
Project Triangle (temporay name) is a track building racing game, where you share tracks with your friends and compete against each other for the fastest time.

Currently the project is still in its early stages, with the bare minimum functionality to create and save a single track, and race around it, but there are plans to save and load an unlimited amount of tracks, set up the racing mechanics for both circuits and drag racing, depending whether the track is looped or not. As well as this there are plans to generate the envioment around the track itself in the future.

Controls

Track Creating

Move - WASD / Left Joystick

Move Cursor - Mouse

Place Node - Space / Right Trigger

Delete Node - X / West Button

Rotate Node left - Q / Left Bumper

Rotate Node right - E / Right Bumper

Pick up / Drop node - Left Mouse / South Button

Zoom out - Up / Down D-pad

Zoom in - Down / Up D-pad

Driving

Steer - AD / Left Joystick

Accelerate-  W / Right Trigger

Break - S / Left Trigger

Drift - Space / South Button

N.B. This is an alpha, there might be issues or bugs, constructive feedback is always welcome :)
